alert.note: Alert for Bergen; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 2:31PM EST until February 19 at 2:45PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST FOR PASSAIC...NORTHWESTERN BERGEN...ORANGE...WESTERN PUTNAM AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES... At 230 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Hopewell Junction to Rockaway, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, West Milford, Ringwood, Pompton Lakes, Suffern, Monroe, Walden, West Point, Warwick, Goshen, Sloatsburg, Cold Spring, New Windsor, Bloomingdale and Gardnertown. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
